mainSequence.step: USER requests VC offer from TAS
TAS sends VC offer response to USER
CA confirms VC offer to USER
CA requests VC Plan ID list from TAS
TAS returns VC Plan ID list response to CA
CA issues VC start request to TAS
TAS sends issue VC start response
CA sends ECDH request to TAS
TAS responds with ECDH response to CA
CA requests issue Profile from TAS
TAS returns issue Profile response to CA
CA requests issue VC from WALLET
WALLET sends issue VC request to TAS
TAS processes VC issuance
ISSUER registers VC meta in Blockchain
ISSUER completes VC E2E encryption
TAS sends VC response to WALLET
WALLET decrypts VC response
WALLET stores the VC
CA requests VC completion from TAS
TAS completes VC issuance and sends response to CA
